thread.title: Fans Send Love to Jamie Lynn Spears After Her Daughter is Seriously Injured in Accident
thread.title_full: Fans Send Love to Jamie Lynn Spears After Her Daughter is Seriously Injured in Accident

author: Just Jared
title: Fans Send Love to Jamie Lynn Spears After Her Daughter is Seriously Injured in Accident
text:
Jamie Lynn Spears â€˜s daughter, Maddie , is reportedly in serious condition after being involved in an ATV accident Sunday (Feb. 5), and fans are reaching out to her in support.
TMZ reported this evening that 8-year-old Maddie had to be airlifted to a hospital after the ATV vehicle she was riding flipped. Reportedly, Jamie Lynn was not with Maddie at the time of the accident. 
According to the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission, there were 97,200 ATV-related accidents that sent people to emergency rooms in 2015, which is up by 500 from 2014. They estimated 28% of those involved children under the age of 16. 
Our thoughts are with Britney Spears â€˜s younger sis, Jamie Lynn , and their entire family. 
My prayers go out 2 @jamielynnspears , may God be w Maddie & u & ur family & may He give her health & strenght to u. I love u. @britneyspears pic.twitter.com/RSjOxX3qCJ
